the questions due to an inordinate amount of email i receive regarding development specific questions i find it sometimes difficult to respond

if you dont hear from me i recommend searching either microsofts msdn library online microsofts online support knowledge base or deja news newsgroup archives for answers to your visual basic related questions
you may find me frequenting some of the vb newsgroups on the microsoft news server msnewsmicrosoftcom and on occasion the vb newsgroups on the news server newsdevxcom
